§a[LOWEST] : Only the bare-bones features required for the shader to run

§a[LOW] : Balanced options for most low end devices

§a[MEDIUM] : Balanced options for most midrange devices

§eAttention : RESTART MINECRAFT TO APPLY SETTINGS!!!

§a[ULTRA] : Maximum quality settings, takes a very powerful device to run smoothly

§eAttention : RESTART MINECRAFT TO APPLY SETTINGS!!!

§a[HIGH (DEFAULT)] : Recommended settings for a relatively powerful GPU

§eAttention : RESTART MINECRAFT TO APPLY SETTINGS!!!
